items.value: Ivan is waiting for the Business Contracts!

are you back already?
Have you checked all the Mailboxes?

Ivan would like to:
25x Business Contracts
i have 2x free Inv. Slots and 25x Contracts with me!

There is a Mailbox in every City / Town!
Find them all and then return to me.

If you lose the Key, that's it and you can't continue with me.
So take good care of the Business Key.
i got it, where did we stop?

It's fun to do Business with you!
These Contracts allow me to give you new tasks.
Come back if you want to learn more!

You get:
1x Metro Card
1x Large Storage Box
Roger Ivan, i will be back!

There is a Mailbox in every City / Town.
With the Business Key you have access to all of them.

Once you've checked out all the Mailboxes, come back to me!
I will reward you for the Contracts.

You get:
1x Business Key
